verses.verse: "I am <S%G1510><s%> the true <S%G228><s%> vine, <S%G288><s%> and My Father <S%G3962><s%> is the vinedresser. <S%G1092><s%>

"Every <S%G3956><s%> branch <S%G2814><s%> in Me that does not bear <S%G5342><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> He takes <S%G142><s%> away; <S%G142><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> [branch] that bears <S%G5342><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> He prunes <S%G2508><s%> it, that it may bear <S%G5342><s%> more <S%G4183><s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>
"You are already <S%G2235><s%> clean <S%G2513><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I have spoken <S%G2980><s%> to you.

"Abide <S%G3306><s%> in Me, and I in you. As the branch <S%G2814><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> bear <S%G5342><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> of itself, <S%G1438><s%> unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> it abides <S%G3306><s%> in the vine, <S%G288><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> [can] you, unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you abide <S%G3306><s%> in Me.

"I am <S%G1510><s%> the vine, <S%G288><s%> you are the branches; <S%G2814><s%> he who abides <S%G3306><s%> in Me, and I in him, he bears <S%G5342><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> fruit; <S%G2590><s%> for apart <S%G5565><s%> from Me you can <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> nothing. <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%>

"If <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> does not abide <S%G3306><s%> in Me, he is thrown <S%G906><s%> away <S%G1854><s%> as a branch, <S%G2814><s%> and dries <S%G3583><s%> up; and they gather <S%G4863><s%> them, and cast <S%G906><s%> them into the fire, <S%G4442><s%> and they are burned. <S%G2545><s%>

"If <S%G1437><s%> you abide <S%G3306><s%> in Me, and My words <S%G4487><s%> abide <S%G3306><s%> in you, ask <S%G154><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you wish, <S%G2309><s%> and it shall be done <S%G1096><s%> for you.

"By this <S%G3778><s%> is My Father <S%G3962><s%> glorified, <S%G1392><s%> that you bear <S%G5342><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> and [so] prove <S%G1096><s%> to be My disciples. <S%G3101><s%>
"Just <S%G2531><s%> as the Father <S%G3962><s%> has loved <S%G25><s%> Me, I have also <S%G2532><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> you; abide <S%G3306><s%> in My love. <S%G26><s%>

"If <S%G1437><s%> you keep <S%G5083><s%> My commandments, <S%G1785><s%> you will abide <S%G3306><s%> in My love; <S%G26><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as I have kept <S%G5083><s%> My Father's commandments, <S%G1785><s%> and abide <S%G3306><s%> in His love. <S%G26><s%>
"These <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> I have spoken <S%G2980><s%> to you, that My joy <S%G5479><s%> may be in you, and [that] your joy <S%G5479><s%> may be made <S%G4137><s%> full. <S%G4137><s%>
"This <S%G3778><s%> is My commandment, <S%G1785><s%> that you love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as I have loved <S%G25><s%> you.

"Greater <S%G3173><s%> love <S%G26><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> than this, <S%G3778><s%> that one <S%G5100><s%> lay <S%G5087><s%> down <S%G5087><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> for his friends. <S%G5384><s%>
"You are My friends, <S%G5384><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I command <S%G1781><s%> you.

"No <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> do I call <S%G3004><s%> you slaves, <S%G1401><s%> for the slave <S%G1401><s%> does not know <S%G3609><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> his master <S%G2962><s%> is doing; <S%G4160><s%> but I have called <S%G3004><s%> you friends, <S%G5384><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> that I have heard <S%G191><s%> from My Father <S%G3962><s%> I have made <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to you.

"You did not choose <S%G1586><s%> Me, but I chose <S%G1586><s%> you, and appointed <S%G5087><s%> you, that you should go <S%G5217><s%> and bear <S%G5342><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> and [that] your fruit <S%G2590><s%> should remain, <S%G3306><s%> that whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G302><s%> you ask <S%G154><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%> in My name, <S%G3686><s%> He may give <S%G1325><s%> to you.
"This <S%G3778><s%> I command <S%G1781><s%> you, that you love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>
"If <S%G1487><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> hates <S%G3404><s%> you, you know <S%G1097><s%> that it has hated <S%G3404><s%> Me before <S%G4413><s%> [it hated] you.

"If <S%G1487><s%> you were of the world, <S%G2889><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> would love <S%G5368><s%> its own; <S%G2398><s%> but because <S%G3754><s%> you are not of the world, <S%G2889><s%> but I chose <S%G1586><s%> you out of the world, <S%G2889><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> hates <S%G3404><s%> you.

"Remember <S%G3421><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> that I said <S%G3004><s%> to you, 'A slave <S%G1401><s%> is not greater <S%G3173><s%> than his master. <S%G2962><s%>' If <S%G1487><s%> they persecuted <S%G1377><s%> Me, they will also <S%G2532><s%> persecute <S%G1377><s%> you; if <S%G1487><s%> they kept <S%G5083><s%> My word, <S%G3056><s%> they will keep <S%G5083><s%> yours <S%G5212><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

"But all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> they will do <S%G4160><s%> to you for My name's sake, <S%G1223><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they do not know <S%G3609><s%> the One who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me.

"If <S%G1487><s%> I had not come <S%G2064><s%> and spoken <S%G2980><s%> to them, they would not have <S%G2192><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> but now <S%G3568><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> excuse <S%G4392><s%> for their sin. <S%G266><s%>
"He who hates <S%G3404><s%> Me hates <S%G3404><s%> My Father <S%G3962><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

"If <S%G1487><s%> I had not done <S%G4160><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them the works <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> else <S%G243><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> they would not have <S%G2192><s%> sin; <S%G266><s%> but now <S%G3568><s%> they have both <S%G2532><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> and hated <S%G3404><s%> Me and My Father <S%G3962><s%> as well. <S%G2532><s%>

"But [they have done this] in order <S%G2443><s%> that the word <S%G3056><s%> may be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> that is written <S%G1125><s%> in their Law, <S%G3551><s%> 'They hated <S%G3404><s%> Me without <S%G1431><s%> a cause. <S%G1431><s%>'

"When <S%G3752><s%> the Helper <S%G3875><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I will send <S%G3992><s%> to you from the Father, <S%G3962><s%> [that is] the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of truth, <S%G225><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> proceeds <S%G1607><s%> from the Father, <S%G3962><s%> He will bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of Me,
and you [will] bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you have been <S%G1510><s%> with Me from the beginning. <S%G746><s%>
